mapper.sql: SELECT stu_id, stu_course, stu_army, stu_admission_date, stu_graduation_date, stu_register_state, stu_student_state, stu_grade, stu_graduation_exam, stu_early_graduation, stu_semester, major_id, major_dual_id, major_minor_id FROM STUDENT
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET stu_course = #{stuCourse}, stu_army = #{stuArmy}, stu_admission_date = #{stuAdmissionDate}, stu_graduation_date = #{stuGraduationDate}, stu_register_state = #{stuRegisterState}, stu_student_state = #{stuStudentState}, stu_grade = #{stuGrade}, stu_graduation_exam = #{stuGraduationExam}, stu_early_graduation = #{stuEarlyGraduation}, stu_semester = #{stuSemester}, major_dual_id = #{majorDualId}, major_minor_id = #{majorMinorId}, major_id = #{majorId} where stu_id = #{stuId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.stu_id, s.stu_course, s.stu_army, s.stu_admission_date, s.stu_graduation_date, s.stu_register_state, s.stu_student_state, s.stu_grade, s.stu_graduation_exam, s.stu_early_graduation, s.stu_semester, m.major_id, m.major_name FROM student s, major m WHERE s.major_id = m.major_id(+)

SELECT s.stu_id, s.stu_course, s.stu_army, s.stu_admission_date, s.stu_graduation_date, s.stu_register_state, s.stu_student_state, s.stu_grade, s.stu_graduation_exam, s.stu_early_graduation, s.stu_semester, s.major_id, s.major_dual_id, s.major_minor_id, u.users_id, u.users_password, u.users_name, u.users_eng_name, u.users_rrn, u.users_email, u.users_phone_num, u.users_cell_num, u.users_national, u.users_current_addr, u.users_born_addr, u.users_enable, u.users_photo FROM student s, users u WHERE s.stu_id = u.users_id AND s.stu_id = #{value}
SELECT s.stu_id, u.users_name, u.users_rrn, u.users_email FROM student s, users u WHERE s.stu_id = u.users_id AND u.users_name Like '%'||#{value}||'%'
SELECT m.major_name, s.major_id FROM student s, major m WHERE s.major_id = m.major_id AND s.stu_id = #{value}
SELECT m.major_name, s.major_dual_id FROM student s, major m WHERE s.major_dual_id = m.major_id AND s.stu_id = #{value}
SELECT m.major_name, s.major_minor_id FROM student s, major m WHERE s.major_minor_id = m.major_id AND s.stu_id = #{value}
